text: In the table editor, is it possible for the user to sort the table view by a column? A bit like the "sort sheet" feature in Google Spreadsheets
That’s a good idea. I’ll make a note of it

Hey guys! We just got a sudden bug with an event calendar where the event detail page is pulling the right URL but is displaying the details for the first row in the table. Has anyone experienced this?
Sudden as in it was working as expected before?
<@U2E6FUEEP> we have a client that is reporting the same issue that all pages are pulling the first row in the table

<@U4RP6AGV9> Yes, it was working yesterday, and then suddenly it’s not.
<@U25C65C3S> That makes me hopeful. Sorry to hear it’s happening to you too. I am noticing, however, that it’s not happening in another portal we’re using dynamic pages for.
I did submit a ticket <@U2E6FUEEP>  - I'll let you know if I hear anything from them.
Thanks, <@U25C65C3S>! I called support earlier today and they eventually concluded that it’s probably something coded on our end. I’ll let them know it’s happening elsewhere.
Looks like you guys got it! You rock!
